entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Snow near the British Columbia border in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 late in the morning. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
